name: Petunia's Plight
description:
WASD to move, IJKL to Shoot, L to interact, H to pause and look at the moon for the time left.

You're Petunia, and you've lost all of your components. Grab them and put them in the ritual circle before a demon is released from its prison!

Music by Incompetech.

Alkhemical Font by FontEndDev (https://fontenddev.com/fonts/alkhemikal/)
